column2: "I could try to do it myself, but what fun would that be? I mean, we all know how that would turn out."
"I'll just hand this over to you rather than pointlessly trying to show off my lack of skills. You'll do me proud, won't you?"
"I know you're the best choice for the job. There's no opponent you can't handle. Plus, you'll do it quick as a flash. "
"Well, with that, best of luck! I'll be relieved watching you work over on this monitor!"
